Reviews.Title: Scam!!!! DEVIL SELLER
Reviews.Author: Beatriz Sullivan "BEST"
Reviews.Content: What a scam!!!!, I purchase this phone because of the price of course but also because they were advertising with Amazon.com. The phone came with a BIg Ship that scractched my hand the metal is sticking out. No software to install, no media card no even the smallest available. My family has bought Blackberries from Amazon and they have got the media card, software , NO ME!!!!I very MAD about the whole experience..

Reviews.Title: Counterfeit Phone
Reviews.Author: John Kasumba
Reviews.Content: This phone was so fake.  It's just unfortunate that I bought it for someone who lives abroad.  I got to find out its problems when the period for returning it had expired.  Black berries are supposed to have memory cards,but this one never had one.  I was also informed that it was tampered with when I took it to a technician.I can not recommend anybody to buy from this store.

Reviews.Title: A good smartphone if you get a real one and not a fake
Reviews.Author: Michelle M. Ress "safoocat"
Reviews.Content: It sounds like the one star reviewers got scammed into buying a fake BlackBerry to mebecause I've had several of this model of BlackBerry and can tell you they are a good phone.Also the camera is a good one so if you are looking for a BlackBerry smartphone don't hesitate to buy this model. Just make sure it's the real thing and not a knock-off.Michelle Ress

Reviews.Title: This Company Shoulde Be Banned From Amazon.com

Reviews.Content: We have been for years buying all kind of products trough Amazon.com and spent thousands of dollars. Amazon.com has my buying record and never, never I had a situation like the one when a I bought my son`s celular phone from this company. Since first day, his BB  is not working properly and we took it to a certified agent who  told us  " inside parts are not original". I hope this not happen  to any one else. Regards,
